description: Now alice can remember things you teach her!

intents.name: GetUserFact
intents.description: User asks for a fact about himself
utterances: can you tell me what's my {favorite color:=>Fact}
can you tell me what's my {name:=>Fact} please
do you remember what's my {favorite dish:=>Fact}
do you know who's my {best friend:=>Fact}
do you know when my {birthday:=>Fact} is
do you remember when my {birthday:=>Fact} is
can you tell me when i {got my driver's license:=>Fact}
please tell me what my {cat name:=>Fact} is
do you know how {tall:=>Fact} i am
do you remember {the village where i grew up:=>Fact}
